Text.val: 02.08.2012 GB SCR17482 Added line If V.PERCDIFF > 999 then set V.PERCDIFF = 999
07.06.2011 GB SCR16506 Added missing test V.DAYSDIFF > 0
27.07.2010 GB SCR15617 Added MlsTrans for parameters send via BCM011CLMSMQ37
-- If V.DAYSDIFF > 0 and V.PERCDIFF > V.PERC and V.PAIDNEW > V.AMOUNT the client

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Average payment days after due date last')&' '&Trim (Str ({0,8},'5'))&' '&MlsTrans ('month[s]')&' '&Trim (Str ({0,21},'3'))&' % '&MlsTrans ('higher')&' '&MlsTrans ('as')&' '&Trim (Str ({0,9},'5'))&' '&MlsTrans ('month[s] earlier')
